entry.title: WIND WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -16.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -23.2°C
Wind: S 12 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:10 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:10 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:10 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
